Computer Parts

CPU

s

The CPU is like the brain of a computer. The CPU sends the signals to control the computer and all its other components.The CPU speed is measured in megahertz or gigahertz. Herts means per second. The most famous companies that make CPUs are AMD and Intel. The CPU also has a fan beneath to keep it from overheating.

fun fact 1
Intel was founded on July 18, 1968, in Mountain View, California, United States.

fun fact 2
The company Intel was incorporated on July 18, 1968, as N M Electronics (the letters standing for Noyce Moore), but quickly changed its name to Intel, short for Integrated Electronics (or Int-el)

fun fact 3
AMD was founded on May 1, 1969, in Sunnyvale, California, United States.
